column4: anyone know how to get compiz working with the nouveau/gallium drivers?

let me quote from #compiz-dev   the Gallium3D driver for offering up OpenGL support will not be going into Ubuntu 11.04 or any other release until the upstream Nouveau developers commit to providing support (or a "1.0" release).

I havent installed any ppas since updating to 10.10 and I followed install isntructions from blogs and I have the driver .. glxinfo reports OpenGL renderer string: Gallium 0.4 on NV43 properly and everything ...
well I cant respond to that... all I know right now is what I mentioned already ,,, you sould probably.. at some point... talk with  sam  on #compiz-dev
